mapper.select: select daily_id, secondary_id, cadre_id, unit_id, group_examine, obs_level from daily_examine where daily_id = #{dailyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into daily_examine (secondary_id, cadre_id, unit_id, group_examine, obs_level) values (#{secondaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cadreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupExamine,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{obsLevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
